features: ✈️【Designed for Travel accessories】Our 18pack reusable travel bottles set with 1 waterproof bag, 2 pcs silicone bottles (3oz/90ml), 2 pcs silicone bottles(2oz/60ml), 2 pcs spray bottles(1.05oz/30ml), 4 pcs cream jars(0.35oz/10ml), 1pcs funnels, labels, brush and 2 pcs spatula!Different accessories for your different needs

🥇【Tsa Approved Leak Proof Travel Bottles】The silicone bottles are designed with 3-layer leak-proof with a sturdy flip-top lid and a drip-free valve to protect your bottle from spills, leaks or drips during transport.Prevent your expensive cosmetics from leaking during travel, with our unique leak-proof design.

💯【Safety PREMIUM SILICONE MATERIAL】This travel size containers are made of high-quality non-toxic BPA-free PET and silicon material, food safe and TSA approved, safe, durable, odorless, refillable and reusable lotion bottle!

👪【Wide Application】 Travel size containers set is used to hold lotion, shampoo, cream, cosmetics and other skin care products perfect containers. Products are suitable for travel, camping, or other outdoor activities.

✔️【Satisfaction Guaranteed】Customer satisfaction is priority with lifetime Hassle Free Warranty. If for any reason you aren't happy with our refillable travel bottles, simply email us and we will do everything to make you 100% satisfied with your purchase.Our expert team always stands by your side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TSA-Approved Toiletry Bliss!
reviews.reviewText: I recently invested in the Travel Bottles for Toiletries, and I couldn't be more pleased with this TSA-approved travel size container set. This collection of travel bottles has made my journeys smoother and more organized, and here's why it deserves a resounding five-star review:1. Perfectly TSA-Approved (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):These travel bottles are a dream come true for frequent flyers. Each bottle complies with TSA guidelines, making security checks a breeze. No more hassles or last-minute decanting of favorite products – these bottles are the ideal travel companions.2. Leak-Proof Design (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):One of the standout features is the leak-proof design. I've tested these bottles extensively, and not a single drop has escaped. The secure sealing mechanism ensures that my liquids stay where they belong, saving my clothes and toiletry bag from potential messes.3. Durable and BPA-Free (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):The quality of these travel bottles is evident from the moment you hold them. The durable, BPA-free material gives me confidence that my toiletries are stored in safe and non-toxic containers. They withstand the rigors of travel without compromising on integrity.4. Easy to Fill and Dispense (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):Filling these bottles is a breeze, thanks to the wide mouth and convenient squeeze design. Dispensing just the right amount of product is effortless, and the flexibility of the silicone material ensures I can get every last drop without waste. It's a user-friendly design that simplifies the travel prep process.5. Versatile and Well-Labeled (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):The set includes various bottle sizes to accommodate different toiletries. Additionally, the bottles are well-labeled, eliminating any guesswork during my travel routine. It's a thoughtful touch that adds to the overall convenience of using these travel bottles.This travel kit has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. They have become an essential part of my travel kit, providing a hassle-free and organized solution for carrying my favorite toiletries. If you're a frequent traveler who values convenience, durability, and compliance with travel regulations, these bottles are a must-have. A solid five stars – highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are perfect for travel. I like the small case they come in and the labels are a nice bonus! The silicon bottles are nicer than hard plastic bottles in my opinion. Good purchase for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For anyone who ever travels, this is absolutely a necessity. It’s beautiful and the colors of the containers are lovely. It has containers to hold anything you need and actually has labels for all the containers. Very easy to clean afterwards and even comes with its own little scrub brush. There is also a tiny funnel to help pouring liquids into the containers. This is the perfect gift to give anyone who travels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and convenience
reviews.reviewText: Great buy, I purchased a his and hers set fits perfectly in my man bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel containers
reviews.reviewText: These travel containers are exactly as pictured. Love the bright colors and the assorted sizes. They’re soft silicone so easy to squeeze. The openings are large and easy to fill, however don’t count on using the included mini funnel, it is so tiny it’s really not useable. I either poured directly into the tubes, or used a regular small funnel (my picture shows the difference in size). They seem to be leak proof. I haven’t cleaned them yet but they seem like they’ll be easy to clean. Overall a great travel set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall this product is amazing!! It comes with a lot for the price and it’s good quality. One bottle did leak but I believe that was my fault for not closing it all the way but it didn’t leak outside of the bag so all good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just what I needed! Easy to fill and use, very colorful which helps distinguish what is what, and doesn't spill. I wish it had a handle because the shape makes it slip out of my hands easily, I've dropped it about 4 times now but nothing spilled so that's good. I'm happy with it and the different options it has!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, durable, and great price!
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for my traveling days. Easy to wash and pack away neatly. I love the colors and quality of these!
